DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a modified version of the Sleep Enhancement Fatigue Reduction Training (SEFRT) system can improve sleep and health-related symptoms and quality of life in shiftwork-naive new nurse graduates.
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Enhancement Training Study for Novice Shiftworkers
DOC.criteria: Englishspeaking nurses scheduled to work at least 2 consecutive night shifts per week in the next 2 months > 6 months experience working nightshift current diagnosis of sleep disorder or affective illness
